channel.title: Posts on min_304
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on min_304

item.title: Crime rate and its' relationship with politics
item.description: Part I. Abstraction Neighbourhood crime rate is always a topic that people care about. In this short data set analysis, I will discuss the change of crime rates for three areas within three year. The main factor I choose is the change of president for this country and his policy that related to refugee. Moreover, I want to see if this data can make a prediction of future trend in crime rates.

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.
